EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Nomex®.
Insulation materials required for food service wells and cooktop inserts that may be available from Corian® distributors: http://www2.dupont.com/Corian_Global_Landing/en_US/index.html, http://www2.dupont.com/Surfaces_Commercial/en_US/sales_support/surfaces_distributors.html
Also, based on their website, Atkins and Pearce makes a High temperature gasket. Breyden Products indicated that insulation material it was a Nomex® sleeve over filler. Garlock Sealing also manufactures Nomex® Gaskets for this application. Attached you will find a link to a more comprehensive technical overview of the Nomex® products to support your request for technical information. (To view the web address, cut and paste the web address below into your browser.) http://www2.dupont.com/Personal_Protection/en_US/assets/downloads/nomex/Nomex_Technical_Guide.pdf Please continue to visit out DuPont websites which provides additional information about Nomex® or Kevlar® as well as other DuPont products.
